title: LF2M TGC
body:
Looking for a Mid Laner or a Top Laner and a Jungler for our team, Truth Gaming Corps.

Must be Bronze or Silver, would prefer it if you lived in Adelaide, South Australia.

I have personally captained a team in seasons 5 that reached Gold IV with 33 wins 0 Losses, but because of the new Dynamic Queue we can no longer play together, so looking to rebuild from scratch!

Mid Laners!
-Must have good knowledge of mid lane matchups.
-Must have good map awareness.
-Must have at least average cs.
-Must be proficient on at least 5 different champions.

Jungler!
-Must have good jungle rotations.
-Must know how to counter gank.
-Must know how to effectively out rotate by assumptions.
-Must know jungle matchups.
-Must be proficient of at least 5 different champions.

Top Laners!
-Must have good knowledge of top lane matchups.
-Must have good map awareness.
-Must be able to cs adequately, bully lane opponent and not overextend if enemy jungler is not visible.
-Must be proficient on at least 5 different champions.

--------------------------

Summoner Name:
Position:
Season 5 Rank:
Current Rank:
Current MMR:
Top Five Champs:
Why do you want to be in a team:

----------------------------

Please leave these details below.

replies.body:
Summoner Name: Deep Sanity
Position: Jungle
Season 5 Rank: Bronze I (climbed to silver II after season ended)
Current Rank: Bronze II
Current MMR: 1069
Top Five Champs: Xin, Lee Sin, Irelia, Rengar, Rek'Sai
Why do you want to be in a team: To show people the potential that i have and to learn new things and definitely have fun ;)

if you take Irelia out, what would your top five junglers be?
do you have any experience in a team?
do you have comms such as curse?

probably rammus or amumu, yes i have experience in teams my last 2 teams have reached silver and gold but then have disbanded, and yes i do use curse i can use any comm needed, also sorry for the late reply

Summoner Name: The Gingninj69
Position:MID
Season 5 Rank: Was at top of bronze 1 and slowly fell
Current Rank: B2 close to promos for B1
Current MMR: 1,125 
Top Five Champs: Zed, Azir, Ekko, Yasuo, Talon
Why do you want to be in a team: I have wanted to be part of for a while now, i feel like i want to meet new people and become part of something, i want to grow with a team as well as meet some friends and get to know some people. I feel like this team would be a good choice since i know how 2 of the lower applicants play. I want to be able to take advice from the team aswell as give advice back. This is a good opportunity for me to learn new things and take my passion for this game further.

I have comms such as Skype, team speak and can get curse

Sorry mate, filled the top lane position and so our current member is locked into the mid lane... So unfortunately we are only looking for a jungler at this time. after we fill the main team we may be looking at recruiting some substitutes if you're interested?
The position has opened up again if you are interested? I've sent you a request in client so just accept it when you can

Sure man
sorry have been away on business 
Is it still open?
With your rank, you wont be able to queue with the team, unless you have a smurf that is in bronze/silver

dude its all dynamic wueue now you cant queue with anyone greater than a tier than you, so bronze can only go with bronze and sivler, silver can only go with bronze and silver and gold, gold with silver gold and plat, plat with gold plat and diamond

What type of "banter" do you want?
Are you more so looking for a casual team?
Just fun convos about random stuff and showcasing stolen dank memez, mostly out of games {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
So you are just looking for a casual team then?
